mapper.select: SELECT sid, file, name, tel, addr, date_format(open_time,'%H:%i') as open_time, date_format(end_time,'%H:%i') as end_time, categoryId, userId FROM shop_info WHERE categoryId = #{categoryId}
SELECT sid, file, name, tel, addr, date_format(open_time,'%H:%i') as open_time, date_format(end_time,'%H:%i') as end_time, categoryId, userId FROM shop_info WHERE sid = #{sid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_info(name, tel, addr, open_time, end_time, categoryId, userId) VALUES (#{name}, #{tel}, #{addr}, #{open_time}, #{end_time}, #{categoryId}, #{userId})
INSERT INTO shop_product(sid, pname, cost) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(sid) from shop_info), #{pname}, #{cost});
